Issue.creator: mberkau
Issue.summary: Asyncio error causes unit_python_sdk test to fail intermitantly
Issue.description: The _run_tests_ script specified inÂ _BUILD.md_ intermittently hangs when running the unit-python-sdk tests due to an asyncio error -- sometimes the testing process completes fine, and other times it hangs. Calls to _docker-compose -p latest -f ./sdk/python/tests/unit_python_sdk.yaml up --abort-on-container-exit_ were made manually to elicit a successful and failed test result, and these results are captured in the attached file.
